nodes.text: Koorst was a male Trandoshan bounty hunter who was taken as an apprentice by the Zabrak Vril Vrakth. He accompanied Vrakth to Nizon in 19 BBY.
Koorst made his first appearance in 2008 in The First to Strike, an adventure in the Dawn of Defiance RPG campaign. He is set to appear later in the campaign in The Gem of Alderaan.
